edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Question
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Question class holds all the information of a single VideoMcq question.

    copyright © Ville-Video 2013

    Since:
    16.10.2013
    Version:
    2.01
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question()
        Constructs an empty question.

        NOTE: An empty question contains one correct and incorrect empty (answer.equals("")) answers.

      • Question

        public Question(int time,
        String question,
        String answer)
        Constructs a question with time question and answer.
        Parameters:
        time - the time of the question in video stream.
        question - the question text.
        answer - the correct answer text.
        Preconditions:
        time >= 0

      • setIncorrectAnswer

        public void setIncorrectAnswer(String incorrectAnswer)
        Sets a single incorrect answer to the question.

        NOTE: Replaces all old incorrect answers from the question!

        Parameters:
        incorrectAnswer - the incorrect answer.

      • setIncorrectAnswers

        public void setIncorrectAnswers(Collection<String> incorrectAnswers)
        Sets (Replaces) the collection of the incorrect answer choices to the question.

        NOTE: Replaces all old incorrect answers from the question!

        Parameters:
        incorrectAnswers - the collection of the wrong answer choices.
